code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Dialer from'./Dialer';import CallScreen from'./CallScreen';import{Twilio}from'@twilio/voice-sdk';import'./Style.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[callActive,setCallActive]=useState(false);const[device,setDevice]=useState(null);const handleCall=phoneNumber=>{if(!device){const token='YOUR_TWILIO_ACCESS_TOKEN';const newDevice=new Device(token);newDevice.on('ready',()=>{console.log('Twilio device is ready');});setDevice(newDevice);}device.connect({To:phoneNumber});setCallActive(true);};const handleHangUp=()=>{device.disconnectAll();setCallActive(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"app",children:!callActive?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dialer,{onCall:handleCall}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CallScreen,{onHangUp:handleHangUp})});};export default App;
